notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This report is independent research funded by the UK Department of Health and Social Care through Innovate UK “New vaccines for global epidemics: development and manufacture” contract numbers. 972212 and 971557 (A.R.-S). The views expressed in this publication are those of the author(s) and not necessarily those of the Department of Health and Social Care. A.R.-S is a Jenner Investigator and an Oxford Martin School Fellow.
